document_data.caption: A map showing Delselar on the Guthland.
document_data.name: Delselar
document_data.mainbody: '''Delselar''', also known locally as '''Dolselar''' and the '''City of Succulent Jewels'''
document_data.Geography: Delselar was founded on the southern border of the [[Guthland]] near the mouth of the [[Thingulph]] along the southern bank of the [[River Dolsel]].
document_data.Description: Delselar was unwalled, stretching for {{SI|3|mi|k|long=yes}} along the banks of the river. The vast majority of structures within Delselar were within a stone's throw from the water.
document_data.Activities: Agents from [[House Jennestas]] infiltrated the city during the 1370s [[DR]], bringing a large number of dangerous [[snake]]s with them to populate the grasslands surrounding the city. The Jennestas also hid magical effects within the city that attracted the snakes, resulting in a much higher number of fatalities from the serpents' encounters with the citizens.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: As series of tunnels beneath the city connected to the [[Pit of Vipers]] temple in the [[Black Jungles]].
